name: Piggle Power
description:
WASD and mouse button to fire.  left ctrl should work too. maybe? 

*** NOTE *** should play in firefox if possible, plays best there. Also, didn't optimize for web at all, so I'll do that soon.

it's got some issues, but I'm trying to work it all out. 

Used a bunch of free artwork from asset store and stuff in a wikitude sample AR (dinosaurs)
